Missouri_City.KTMD: KTMD, virtual channel 47 (UHF digital channel 48), is a Telemundo owned-and-operated television station serving Houston, Texas, United States that is licensed to Galveston. The station is owned by the NBC Owned Television Stations subsidiary of NBCUniversal (which itself is a division of Comcast). KTMD maintains studio facilities located on I-610 and Bevis Street on the northwest side of Houston.
